00087 #define UPKLIST_METANODE(TYPE, NAME) \
00088     struct { TYPE * head; TYPE * tail; TYPE * prevp; TYPE * nextp; TYPE * tempp; TYPE * thisp; uint32_t count; } * NAME
00089 
00090 
00091 #define UPKLIST_INIT(TYPE, NAME) \
00092     UPKLIST_METANODE(TYPE, NAME) = NULL; \
00093     NAME = calloc(1, sizeof(*NAME))
00094 
00095 
00096 #define _UPKLIST_NEWNODE(NAME) \
00097     NAME->tempp = calloc(1,sizeof(*(NAME->tempp)))
00098 
00099 
00100 #define UPKLIST_APPEND_THIS(NAME) \
00101     _UPKLIST_NEWNODE(NAME); \
00102     NAME->tempp->next = NAME->nextp; \
00103     if(! NAME->nextp ) { NAME->tail = NAME->tempp; } \
00104     if(! NAME->prevp && NAME->count == 0 ) { NAME->head = NAME->tempp; } \
00105     if(NAME->thisp) { NAME->thisp->next = NAME->tempp; } \
00106     ++NAME->count; \
00107     NAME->thisp = NAME->tempp;
00108 
00109 
00110 #define UPKLIST_APPEND(NAME) \
00111     NAME->thisp = NAME->tail; \
00112     NAME->prevp = (NAME->prevp) ? NAME->prevp : NAME->head; \
00113     UPKLIST_APPEND_THIS(NAME); \
00114     NAME->prevp = NULL
00115 
00116 
00117 #define UPKLIST_PREPEND_THIS(NAME) \
00118     _UPKLIST_NEWNODE(NAME); \
00119     NAME->tempp->next = NAME->thisp; \
00120     if(! NAME->nextp ) { NAME->tail = NAME->tempp; } \
00121     if(! NAME->prevp ) { NAME->head = NAME->tempp; } else { NAME->prevp->next = NAME->tempp; } \
00122     ++NAME->count; \
00123     NAME->thisp = NAME->tempp
00124 
00125 
00126 #define UPKLIST_PREPEND(NAME) \
00127     NAME->prevp = NULL; \
00128     NAME->thisp = NAME->head; \
00129     UPKLIST_PREPEND_THIS(NAME)
00130 
00131 #define _UPKLIST_NEXTNODE(NAME) ( (NAME->thisp) ? NAME->thisp->next : NULL )
00132 
00133 #define _UPKLIST_FOREACH_CONTINUE(NAME) \
00134     NAME->tempp = NULL, NAME->prevp = NAME->thisp, NAME->thisp = NAME->nextp, NAME->nextp = _UPKLIST_NEXTNODE(NAME)
00135 
00136 
00137 #define _UPKLIST_FOREACH_INIT(NAME) \
00138     NAME->tempp = NULL, NAME->prevp = NULL, NAME->thisp = NAME->head, NAME->nextp = _UPKLIST_NEXTNODE(NAME)
00139 
00140 
00141 #define UPKLIST_FOREACH(NAME) \
00142     for( _UPKLIST_FOREACH_INIT(NAME); NAME->thisp != NULL; _UPKLIST_FOREACH_CONTINUE(NAME) )
00143 
00144 
00145 #define UPKLIST_SWAP(NAME, A, APREV, B, BPREV) \
00146     NAME->tempp = calloc(1,sizeof(*NAME->tempp)); \
00147     APREV->next = B; \
00148     BPREV->next = A; \
00149     NAME->tempp->next = A->next; \
00150     A->next = B->next; \
00151     B->next = NAME->tempp->next; \
00152     free(NAME->tempp); NAME->tempp = NULL
00153 
00154 
00155 #define UPKLIST_UNLINK(NAME) \
00156     if(NAME->thisp) { \
00157         if(! NAME->prevp ) { NAME->head = NAME->nextp; } else { NAME->prevp->next = NAME->nextp; } \
00158         if(! NAME->nextp ) { NAME->tail = NAME->prevp; } \
00159         free(NAME->thisp); NAME->thisp = NULL; \
00160         --NAME->count; \
00161     }
00162 
00163 
00164 #define UPKLIST_FREE(NAME) \
00165     UPKLIST_FOREACH(NAME) { \
00166         UPKLIST_UNLINK(NAME); \
00167     }\
00168     if(NAME) { free(NAME); }
00169 
00170 #define UPKDLIST_METANODE(TYPE, NAME) \
00171     struct { TYPE * head; TYPE * tail; TYPE * prevp; TYPE * nextp; TYPE * tempp; TYPE * thisp; uint32_t count; } * NAME
00172 
00173 
00174 #define _UPKDLIST_NEWNODE(NAME) \
00175     NAME->tempp = calloc(1,sizeof(*(NAME->tempp)))
00176 
00177 
00178 #define UPKDLIST_INIT(TYPE, NAME) \
00179     UPKDLIST_METANODE(TYPE, NAME) = NULL; \
00180     NAME = calloc(1, sizeof(*NAME)); \
00181 
00182 
00183 #define UPKDLIST_APPEND_THIS(NAME) \
00184     _UPKDLIST_NEWNODE(NAME); \
00185     NAME->tempp->next = NAME->nextp; \
00186     if(NAME->thisp) { NAME->thisp->next = NAME->tempp; NAME->tempp->prev = NAME->thisp; } \
00187     if(! NAME->nextp ) { NAME->tail = NAME->tempp; } \
00188     if(! NAME->prevp && NAME->count == 0 ) { NAME->head = NAME->tempp; } \
00189     ++NAME->count; \
00190     NAME->thisp = NAME->tempp;
00191 
00192 
00193 #define UPKDLIST_APPEND(NAME) \
00194     NAME->thisp = NAME->tail; \
00195     NAME->prevp = (NAME->thisp) ? NAME->thisp->prev : NAME->head; \
00196     UPKDLIST_APPEND_THIS(NAME)
00197 
00198 
00199 #define UPKDLIST_PREPEND_THIS(NAME) \
00200     _UPKDLIST_NEWNODE(NAME); \
00201     NAME->tempp->next = NAME->thisp; \
00202     if(NAME->thisp) {  NAME->tempp->prev = NAME->thisp->prev; NAME->thisp->prev = NAME->tempp; } \
00203     if(! NAME->nextp ) { NAME->tail = NAME->tempp; } \
00204     if(! NAME->prevp ) { NAME->head = NAME->tempp; } else { NAME->prevp->next = NAME->tempp; } \
00205     ++NAME->count; \
00206     NAME->thisp = NAME->tempp
00207 
00208 
00209 #define UPKDLIST_PREPEND(NAME) \
00210     NAME->prevp = NULL; \
00211     NAME->thisp = NAME->head; \
00212     UPKDLIST_PREPEND_THIS(NAME)
00213 
00214 #define _UPKDLIST_NEXTNODE(NAME) ( (NAME->thisp) ? NAME->thisp->next : NULL )
00215 #define _UPKDLIST_PREVNODE(NAME) ( (NAME->thisp) ? NAME->thisp->prev : NULL )
00216 
00217 #define _UPKDLIST_FOREACH_CONTINUE(NAME) \
00218     NAME->tempp = NULL, NAME->prevp = NAME->thisp, NAME->thisp = NAME->nextp, \
00219     NAME->nextp = _UPKDLIST_NEXTNODE(NAME), NAME->prevp = _UPKDLIST_PREVNODE(NAME)
00220 
00221 #define _UPKDLIST_FOREACH_INIT(NAME) \
00222     NAME->tempp = NULL, NAME->prevp = NULL, NAME->thisp = NAME->head, NAME->nextp = _UPKDLIST_NEXTNODE(NAME)
00223 
00224 
00225 #define UPKDLIST_FOREACH(NAME) \
00226     for( _UPKDLIST_FOREACH_INIT(NAME); NAME->thisp != NULL; _UPKDLIST_FOREACH_CONTINUE(NAME) )
00227 
00228 #define _UPKDLIST_FOREACH_R_CONTINUE(NAME) \
00229     NAME->tempp = NULL, NAME->nextp = NAME->thisp, NAME->thisp = NAME->prevp, \
00230     NAME->prevp = _UPKDLIST_PREVNODE(NAME), NAME->nextp = _UPKDLIST_NEXTNODE(NAME)
00231 
00232 #define _UPKDLIST_FOREACH_R_INIT(NAME) \
00233     NAME->tempp = NULL, NAME->nextp = NULL, NAME->thisp = NAME->tail, NAME->prevp = _UPKDLIST_PREVNODE(NAME)
00234 
00235 #define UPKDLIST_FOREACH_REVERSE(NAME) \
00236     for( _UPKDLIST_FOREACH_R_INIT(NAME); NAME->thisp != NULL; _UPKDLIST_FOREACH_R_CONTINUE(NAME) )
00237 
00238 
00239 #define UPKDLIST_SWAP(NAME, A, B) \
00240     NAME->tempp = calloc(1,sizeof(*NAME->tempp)); \
00241     A->prev->next = B; \
00242     B->prev->next = A; \
00243     NAME->tempp->next = A->next; \
00244     NAME->tempp->prev = A->prev; \
00245     A->next = B->next; \
00246     A->prev = B->prev; \
00247     B->next = NAME->tempp->next; \
00248     B->prev = NAME->tempp->prev; \
00249     free(NAME->tempp); NAME->tempp = NULL
00250 
00251 
00252 #define UPKDLIST_UNLINK(NAME) \
00253     if(NAME->thisp) { \
00254         if(! NAME->prevp ) { NAME->head = NAME->nextp; } else { NAME->prevp->next = NAME->nextp; } \
00255         if(! NAME->nextp ) { NAME->tail = NAME->prevp; } else { NAME->nextp->prev = NAME->prevp; }  \
00256         free(NAME->thisp); NAME->thisp = NULL; \
00257         --NAME->count; \
00258     }
00259 
00260 
00261 #define UPKDLIST_FREE(NAME) \
00262     UPKDLIST_FOREACH(NAME) { \
00263         UPKDLIST_UNLINK(NAME); \
00264     }\
00265     if(NAME) { free(NAME); }
00266

00268 #endif
